executable.title: DTI Fiber tract statistics tool
executable.description: This is a command line tool which allows the user to study the behavior of water diffusion (using DTI data) along the length of the white matter fiber-tracts.
executable.contributor: Anuja Sharma, Yundi Shi, Sylvain Gouttard, Martin Styner, Guido Gerig
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health

file.name: input_fiber_file
file.label: Input Fiber File
file.description: input fiber file that needs to be in .vtk format

file.name: output_stats_file
file.label: Output Statistics File
file.description: Ouput statistics file in .fvp format that has the statistics along the fiber

string.name: auto_plane_origin
string.label: Way to calculate auto plane origin
string.description: Way to calculate auto plane origin by default origin is calculated with the center of gravity. "median" will calculate the median point on the fiber

file.name: window_file
file.label: csv file containing the histogram values for the chosen kernel window
file.description: csv file containing the histogram values for the chosen kernel window

boolean.name: image_space
boolean.description: The fiber file is in default in world coordinate space. This argument changes it to image space

double.name: step_size
double.label: Step size used for sampling the fiber file
double.description: Step size used for sampling the fiber file. It needs to be larger than 0.1

integer.name: window
integer.label: window (-1 means no window chosen for visualization), the window value lies in range [0,max_number_of_kernel_windows] where max_number_of_kernel_windows depends on the stepsize chosen and available arc length range
integer.description: window (default value: -1 (no window chosen for visualization)), the window value lies in range [0,max_number_of_kernel_windows] where max_number_of_kernel_windows depends on the stepsize chosen and available arc length range

double.name: bandwidth
double.label: Bandwidth or std for the kernel used in noise model
double.description: bandwidth or standard deviation for the kernel used in modeling noise (default value: 1 unit) It needs to be larger than 0.1

string-vector.name: parameter_list
string-vector.label: scalar diffusion properties that are calculated
string-vector.description: the list of scalar diffusion properties that are calculated. It can be one or multiple of the following: fa,md,ad,l2,l3,fro,rd,ga

string-enumeration.name: stat_type
string-enumeration.label: stat_type
string-enumeration.description: type of maximum likelihood estimate at each point

boolean.name: useNonCrossingFibers
boolean.label: Use non crossing fibers
boolean.description: Use every fibers even if they do not cross the plane
